channel.title: KGB Archiver
channel.description:
This archiver is fucking amazing, I tested it by compressing openoffice which is 118mb. This program compressed it into 4,9mb! Much better than winrar and winzip, although the bad side of this is that it has high recommendations e.g you need 256mb ram and 1,5ghz cpu.
http://kgbarchiver.net/

item.title: KGB Archiver
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

It’s a Sourceforge project, and all the download links point to Sourceforge itself. That generally means it’s fine. Open source always gives you the option of compiling it yourself if you really don’t trust the developers.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

I’m not standing behind this anymore, it took 5mins to decompress a 1mb file…

item.title: KGB Archiver
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:6, topic:158664”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=216209.msg1885508#msg1885508 date=1195420641]
I actually tried this, you can see the results here.

amidoinitrite?
[/quote]Yeah I saw, what compression level did you use?[/quote]

Maximum. It estimated it would take over 2 million hours to compress to 13kb, then it fixed it’s self at 2.4mb~ and about 60 hours, then the hours dropped and the estimated size rose. I have no idea why.

Read full topic

Much better than winrar and winzip, although the bad side of this is that it has high recommendations e.g you need 256mb ram and 1,5ghz cpu.

http://kgbarchiver.net/[/quote]

Or did you mean 49mb??
Either way it sounds pretty sweet.

item.title: KGB Archiver
item.dc:creator: @llib llib
item.description:
@llib wrote:

I figured it was a PAQ compression, when you said how much it reduced it. Although how long did it take to compress? I had another program that could use PAQ compression but it took at least 45 mins to compress something, and I have a gig of ram and 2.79ghz. I’m downloading this and I’ll see how fast it goes.

Read full topic
